useTabs.description: Whether to use tabs (true) or spaces (false).

newLineKind.description: The kind of newline to use.

oneOf.description: For each file, uses the newline kind found at the end of the last line.
Uses the system standard (ex. crlf on Windows).

indentWidth.description: The number of characters for an indent.

uppercase.description: Use ALL CAPS for reserved words.

linesBetweenQueries.description: Number of line breaks between quries.

inline.description: Keep the query in a single line.

maxInlineBlock.description: Maximum length of an inline block.

maxInlineArguments.description: Maximum length of inline arguments. If unset keep every argument in a separate line.

maxInlineTopLevel.description: Inline the argument at the top level if they would fit a line of this length.

joinsAsTopLevel.description: Consider any JOIN statement as a top level keyword instead of a reserved keyword.
